activities:
CloudApp (parent company is Aluminum.io) is a file sharing service that allows its customers to share screenshots, screen recordings and files(images, documents, Gifs, etc.) via URL links which they receive when they upload a file. 
The customers files are never actually stored on CloudApp's servers; they are transferred straight from the user's to Amazon's trusted S3 cloud storage platform.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: All personal data processed by CloudApp is covered under CloudApp's self-certification. This data covered includes manually processed data.
recoursemech: European Data Protection Authorities & Swiss FDPIC
